^(access_key_id)$.description: The access key ID that identifies the temporary credentials.

^(secret_access_key)$.description: The secret access key associated with the access key.

^(session_token)$.description: The generated JWT that users must pass to use the temporary credentials.

accessKeyId.description: The access key ID that identifies the temporary credentials.

secretAccessKey.description: The secret access key associated with the access key.

sessionToken.description: The generated JWT that users must pass to use the temporary credentials.
